shortdesc.ph: The configuration of the captured screen.

plentry.pd:
Whether to capture the window on the screen:
: Capture the window.
: (Default) Capture the screen, not the window.

pd.props: cpp unreal bp mac electron unity flutter

ph.props: cpp unreal bp electron unity flutter cs

pd.ph: The display ID of the screen.
pd.note: This parameter takes effect only when you want to capture the screen on macOS.

plentry.pd: The display ID of the screen. You do not need to set this parameter.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp electron unity flutter cs

ph.props: cpp unreal bp electron unity flutter

pd.ph: The relative position of the shared screen to the virtual screen.
pd.note: This parameter takes effect only when you want to capture the screen on Windows.
This parameter takes effect only when you want to capture the window.

pt.props: mac cpp unreal bp electron rn flutter

pd.props: cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron cs

plentry.pd: (For Windows and macOS only) The relative position of the shared region to the whole screen. See . If you do not set this parameter, the SDK shares the whole screen. If the region you set exceeds the boundary of the screen, only the region within in the screen is shared. If you set width or height in as 0, the whole screen is shared.
The relative position of the shared region to the whole screen. The data type is CGRect.
